chapter.title: Anyframe IAM Technical Specification
chapter.para: Technical specification for applying Anyframe IAM are as the following.

listitem.para: Core Framework : Anyframe Java - Core Framework (or Spring Framework-based Framework)
Web Framework : Anyframe Java - Web Framework (or SpringMVC-based Web Framework)

chapter.para: Currently 1.1.3 version provides tag library for Presentation Layer control with JSP only, and adding function to each UI product will be provided depending on the market condition. Anyframe IAM does not support Struts Framework-based authorization.
